styles.header: w-full bg-[#020617] p-6 flex items-center justify-between mb-12 border-b border-[#292524]
styles.h6: text-lg font-medium text-[#78716C] mb-2 uppercase tracking-wider
styles.button: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-3 bg-[#F59E0B] text-[#020617] rounded-lg hover:bg-[#FBBF24] transition shadow-md
styles.input: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#292524] rounded-lg bg-[#020617] text-[#FAFAF9] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#FBBF24] focus:border-[#FBBF24]
styles.textarea: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#292524] rounded-lg bg-[#020617] text-[#FAFAF9] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#FBBF24] focus:border-[#FBBF24]
styles.select: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#292524] rounded-lg bg-[#020617] text-[#FAFAF9] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#FBBF24] focus:border-[#FBBF24]
styles.label: text-sm font-medium mb-1 block text-[#D6D3D1]
styles.th: px-4 py-3 border border-[#292524] bg-[#F59E0B] text-[#020617] text-left
styles.blockquote: pl-6 border-l-4 border-[#FBBF24] italic text-[#E7E5E4] my-6 bg-[#020617] p-4 rounded-lg
styles.code: font-mono text-sm bg-[#020617] text-[#FB7185] px-2 py-1 rounded-md
styles.pre: font-mono text-sm bg-[#020617] text-[#FB7185] p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-6 border border-[#292524]
styles.aside: bg-[#020617] rounded-xl p-5 border border-[#292524] shadow-md text-[#D6D3D1] mb-10
styles.footer: w-full text-center text-[#78716C] py-6 border-t border-[#292524]
styles.details: mb-4 bg-[#020617] border border-[#292524] rounded-lg p-4
styles.meter: block w-full h-2 bg-[#020617] rounded-md overflow-hidden
styles.progress: block w-full h-2 bg-[#292524] rounded-lg overflow-hidden
styles.dialog: bg-[#020617] p-6 rounded-xl shadow-2xl max-w-lg mx-auto border border-[#292524]
styles.datalist: block w-full px-4 py-2 border border-[#292524] rounded-lg bg-[#020617]
styles.output: inline-block px-2 py-1 bg-[#020617] text-[#FAFAF9] rounded-md
